questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source A. Why do you think the cartoon was published on the internet? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Sources B and C. How different are Sources B and C about the November Paris terror attacks? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source D. Why do you think the French President made this speech after the November Paris terror attacks? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source E. How useful is Source E as evidence about the threat of terrorism? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source F. Are you surprised by the cartoonist's view of the November Paris terror attacks? Explain your answer.
